experience: You and Robert both know Steve Gershik, Ed Nusbaum, and 28 others

CIO Services and IT Transformation practice area ownerGEN5 delivers IT organizations that drive innovation across the enterprise - IT that contributes to both the bottom-line AND the top-line performance of the company. We help client executives understand and develop IT as a strategic weapon, while helping IT transform their contribution from "technology delivery" to "Strategy-Focused, Business-Driven Solution Providers". GEN5 Consulting provides industry-leading expertise in Interim / Transitional IT Leadership, strategy development and actualization, IT organizational transformation, organizational assessment / effectiveness / turnaround and management / leadership development training services and cross-organizational / value chain relationship optimization. Our unique approach and proprietary toolset will deliver results that will amaze, in a shorter time than you ever thought possible, and at a price-point you can readily afford. Our application project experts bring decades of experience successfully implementing enterprise applications like ERP, CRM, WM, HIT, EHR / EMR, Accounting and Financial systems, PLM / PDM, and others. We provide the experience and expertise to integrate these systems properly into your business process model. But we offer even more. If you're like most companies, you've implemented systems like these in the past, but just aren't getting the value you expected. We work with companies every day to help them understand why they're not getting the benefits they expected. We work with them to quickly identify the problems and fix them. Clients immediately gain operational and financial benefits that consistently AMAZE!

recommendations: Brian Haun
President, CEO, COO, VP
March 29, 2016, Brian was a client of Robert’s

Robert provided I/T consulting services to Van Doren, Inc, when I was CEO there.  More accurately put, he provided management consulting services, as he brings organizational wisdom and expertise that transcends I/T.  Robert quickly earned the trust of our organization, and guided us through building all necessary foundation pieces that ensured a successful ERP system implementation.  He also provided me with advice on organizational issues that had to be addressed first, if the system was to realize its full potential.  If you want someone who knows I/T inside and out, and brings an executive level perspective, he's the guy to hire!

Technical Sales Consultant at PCM
February 14, 2012, Aaron was a client of Robert’s

I met Robert while he was the acting CIO / consultant for a renewable energy organization.  Robert’s vision was to lead the organization to a more efficient IT model.  Robert was up front with his objectives and clear on his purpose and because of this I was able to propose the solution that fit his organization.  When changes needed to be made Robert was again up front and clear with the changes he needed and because of that I was able to bring my organization around to his line of thinking.  To this day I still have the renewable energy organization as a client even though Robert has moved on.  I consider them one of my best references because we can show tangible results based on Robert’s vision.  I highly recommend Robert as both a visionary and one who can realize the goals of an organization.

Brian Haun
President, CEO, COO, VP
June 2, 2016, Brian was a client of Robert’s

I worked with Brian in his role as CEO of Van Doren Sales. He had stepped into this challenging position at a company that, after decades of relative stasis, was facing a variety of market pressures, along with organizational and operational challenges. As Brian and I worked closely together to prepare Van Doren for their ERP system implementation, I watched Mr. Haun execute an extremely well-thought-out plan and methodological approach to driving steady and highly impactful improvement across the entire company. I was consistently impressed with the results he produced, but I was particularly moved by the compassion and empathy he demonstrated throughout. His leadership and absolute focus on both bottom-line and top-line performance were relentless and extremely effective. I can say with absolute conviction that Brian Haun brings exceptional leadership, change management, and hard-dollar improvement, along with very real commitment to bringing teams together to perform at levels that were previously unattainable. Brian always demonstrates the highest levels of personal integrity and honesty, and I'm proud to call him my friend.

summary: I'm the founder of GEN5 Consulting, LLC and one of the region's foremost Information Technology (IT) management & transformation consultants. I formed GEN5 (formerly Ascension Consulting) in 2001. I have over 25 years of experience managing and leading business and IT organizations. I've helped many companies increase their business performance and achieve competitive advantage by leveraging IT more effectively.  I'm an expert in IT strategic planning, governance, and change management processes, and I'm proficient at translating strategy into actions that deliver business value. I'm an IT organizational design, effectiveness & turnaround expert with laser-like focus on IT performance improvement. As an engaging and informative speaker, I'm often asked to share my unique experience as business AND IT executive, & consulting expert helping SMB executive teams, boards, VC's and shareholders maximize the value of their IT investment.INDUSTRY EXPERIENCE: • Biotechnology / Pharma• Manufacturing • Non-Profit / Not-for-Profit• Managed Services• Government / Public Sector• Transportation• Healthcare (Hospital / Providers)• Healthcare (Insurers / Payers)• Software / Hi-Tech• Renewables & Alternative Energy• EducationSPECIALITIES:• Executive Leadership• Interim & Transitional CIO • Strategy & Alignment• Executive Coaching & Mentoring• IT Staffing• Business Planning• M&A, Startup & Growth• Process Improvement & Best Practices• IT Audit, Performance & Turnaround• Turnaround & Performance Improvement • Integrating IT/Business• Organizational Development & Team Building• IT Sourcing & Outsourcing• Contract Negotiations • Strategic Alliances• Cloud Migration• Procurement & Acquisitions• Program and Project Management• QA• Project & Program Rescue• Keynote / Public Speaking
name: Robert Slaughter
title: President & Managing Partner, GEN5 Consulting - Interim CIO - Startup CEO, IT Transformation Expert & Keynote Speaker
